subject: Re: Longhorn Beta 3 joins
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Simo,

> I have no tried against longhorn yet, but honestly, 
> the transcript I read in this blog is not the good.
> There is simply just one net ads join try after a good 
> number of error in configuring/using kerberos. I
> would like to see a test and see some logs before
> saying it does not work.
> 
> In any case, I agree it is time to start testing longhorn.

That is my only point.  The blog was linked from Linux Today
so due to the amount of press it will or has gotten, we need
to respond.  I agree that any needed fixes are probably not
a big deal and that the blog was not to most technical review
I've ever seen. But since no us has are really testing the
3.0.x joins against Longhorn, now is a good time to start.

No huge rush.  But by 3.0.26 we should at least know
what the playing field looks like.





cheers, jerry
